Metadata.title: SOCIÉTÉ M NOUR – Supply & Distribution in Bangui
Metadata.description: ETS M NOUR is a company specializing in the supply and distribution of various products and equipment in Bangui, Central African Republic.

Hero.subtitle: Welcome to SOCIÉTÉ M NOUR
Hero.title: Your reliable partner in supply and distribution.
Hero.description: Specializing in the supply and distribution of various products and equipment. We support businesses, NGOs and institutions with tailored, reliable and efficient solutions.

WhyChooseUs.subtitle: Why Choose Us
WhyChooseUs.title: Excellence
WhyChooseUs.description: Our company stands out through its ability to quickly understand customer needs and offer tailored, reliable solutions that meet the required standards.

quality.title: Guaranteed Quality
quality.description: Every product is rigorously inspected to ensure compliance with standards and customer satisfaction.

speed.title: Fast Execution
speed.description: Fast and reliable delivery with strict adherence to the deadlines agreed upon with our partners.

support.title: Dedicated Support
support.description: Our team is at your disposal to answer all your requests and support you in your projects.

trust.title: Trust & Transparency
trust.description: We prioritize a relationship of trust based on price transparency and respect for commitments.

SpecialOffers.subtitle: For Businesses & Institutions
SpecialOffers.title: Orders & Partnerships
SpecialOffers.description: Looking for a reliable supplier? We offer custom procurement solutions tailored to public and private market requirements, with competitive pricing and dedicated support.

About.title: The M NOUR Story
About.paragraph1: ETS M NOUR is a company specializing in the supply and distribution of various products and equipment. We support businesses, NGOs and institutions with tailored, reliable and efficient solutions. Our priority is customer satisfaction and the fulfillment of commitments.
About.paragraph2: Founded in 2021 in Bangui, our company addresses the growing need for reliable, accessible products and services delivered on time. We help our clients easily procure products that meet their needs, guaranteeing quality, price transparency and on-time delivery.

client1.name: Jean-Baptiste Mokom
client1.text: SOCIÉTÉ M NOUR has been a reliable partner for our procurement projects. Product quality and on-time delivery — we are very satisfied with their service.

client2.name: Marie-Claire Zanga
client2.text: The diversity of products offered and the transparency of pricing convinced us. A trusted supplier for all our institutional orders.

client3.name: Ibrahim Mahamat
client3.text: Since our collaboration with M NOUR, we have a reliable partner who understands our needs. Their responsiveness and professionalism are remarkable.

Newsletter.subtitle: Stay Updated
Newsletter.title: Subscribe to Our Newsletter
Newsletter.description: Get the latest updates on our products, exclusive offers and services delivered straight to your inbox.
Newsletter.privacy: By subscribing, you agree to our Privacy Policy. We respect your privacy.

Contact.subtitle: Contact Us
Contact.title: Let's Work Together
Contact.description: Questions about our products or services? We're here to help. Contact us and let's discuss how we can meet your needs.

Footer.description: Your trusted partner for the supply and distribution of various products and equipment. Serving our clients with excellence since 2021.
Footer.copyright: © {year} SOCIÉTÉ M NOUR. All rights reserved.

AboutPage.heroDescription: Since 2021, SOCIÉTÉ M NOUR has been the trusted partner for businesses, NGOs and institutions across the Central African Republic.
AboutPage.storyP1: Founded in 2021 in Bangui, SOCIÉTÉ M NOUR was born from a simple yet powerful vision: to bridge the gap between quality products and the businesses that need them most.
AboutPage.storyP2: In a market where reliability and transparency are paramount, we set out to create a supply and distribution company that our clients could truly depend on. From day one, our commitment has been to deliver products that meet the highest standards, at transparent prices, and always on time.
AboutPage.storyP3: Today, we proudly serve over 50 clients across diverse sectors — from international NGOs to local businesses and government institutions — providing everything from office supplies and professional equipment to technical materials and agricultural products.
AboutPage.founderBorn: Born May 1, 2002 — Bangui, Central African Republic
AboutPage.founderBio1: A young and visionary entrepreneur, Mahamat Nour Zakaria Sakine founded SOCIÉTÉ M NOUR with the ambition of transforming the supply and distribution landscape in the Central African Republic.
AboutPage.founderBio2: His leadership is defined by a relentless pursuit of excellence, an unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction, and a deep understanding of the local market's needs. Under his guidance, the company has grown from a startup to a trusted name in supply and distribution.
AboutPage.founderBio3: Mahamat believes that business success comes from building genuine relationships based on trust, transparency, and mutual respect.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We conduct every transaction with honesty and transparency, building lasting relationships based on trust.

excellence.description: We hold ourselves to the highest standards in product quality, service delivery, and customer care.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously seek new ways to improve our services and better meet our clients' evolving needs.

AboutPage.ctaDescription: Whether you need bulk supplies, specialized equipment, or a long-term distribution partner — we're here to help.

ServicesPage.heroDescription: From office consumables to construction works, we provide comprehensive procurement and distribution solutions tailored for businesses, NGOs, and institutions across the Central African Republic.
ServicesPage.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search or filter to find what you're looking for.

officeSupplies.title: Office Supplies
officeSupplies.description: Stationery, paper, pens, binders, and all daily office consumables.

officeFurniture.title: Office Furniture
officeFurniture.description: Desks, chairs, shelving, and complete office interior equipment.

itConsumables.title: IT Consumables
itConsumables.description: Ink cartridges, toners, cables, peripherals, and computer accessories.

labConsumables.title: Laboratory Consumables
labConsumables.description: Reagents, glassware, and laboratory supplies for research and healthcare.

generalHardware.title: General Hardware
generalHardware.description: Tools, fasteners, and hardware supplies for maintenance and works.

cleaningProducts.title: Cleaning & Hygiene Products
cleaningProducts.description: Detergents, disinfectants, and hygiene supplies for offices and institutions.

foodProducts.title: Food Products
foodProducts.description: Staple food items and provisions for institutions and humanitarian operations.

nfiKits.title: NFI Kits (Non-Food Items)
nfiKits.description: Non-Food Item kits for humanitarian aid, emergency relief, and development projects.

marketGardening.title: Market Gardening Products
marketGardening.description: Inputs and supplies for vegetable and market garden cultivation.

cropSeeds.title: Vegetable & Food Crop Seeds
cropSeeds.description: Certified seeds adapted to Central African growing conditions with high yield potential.

agriculturalTools.title: Agricultural Tools
agriculturalTools.description: Hand tools and equipment for field cultivation and agricultural activities.

automotiveParts.title: Automotive Spare Parts
automotiveParts.description: Spare parts and components for light vehicles, 4x4 fleet, and transport vehicles.

truckTires.title: Truck Tires
truckTires.description: Heavy-duty tires for trucks and transport vehicles of all capacities.

drillingMaterials.title: Drilling Materials & Equipment
drillingMaterials.description: Pipes, pumps, and specialized equipment for water drilling and borehole projects.

buildingConstruction.title: Building Construction
buildingConstruction.description: Construction of residential, commercial, and institutional buildings to specification.

publicWorks.title: Public Works (BTP)
publicWorks.description: Road works, drainage, infrastructure, and civil engineering projects.

vehicleRental.title: Vehicle Rental Services
vehicleRental.description: Short and long-term rental of cars and light utility vehicles.

vehicleSales.title: Sale of Brand-New Vehicles
vehicleSales.description: Supply and sale of brand-new passenger cars and utility vehicles.

importGoods.title: Import of Goods
importGoods.description: Importation of goods and equipment from international suppliers worldwide.

exportActivities.title: Export Activities
exportActivities.description: Export facilitation for local products, commodities, and goods.

fairOrganization.title: Fair Organization & General Services
fairOrganization.description: Organization of trade fairs, professional events, and general logistical services.
